ISSUE.TITLE: Displaying user who received an expense payment in bank entries
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Following [#24946](https://github.com/Dolibarr/dolibarr/issues/24946), the same occurs for expense payments : the name of the user who received the payment is missing in the bank entries, remains empty while it appears for salary payments. ![image](https://github.com/Dolibarr/dolibarr/assets/14906222/27d4e09f-fc09-4029-b0c9-2970911e2fab) ### Dolibarr Version 19.0.2 ### Environment PHP _No response_ ### Environment Database _No response_ ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior _No response_ ### Attached files _No response_
